!http://www.evageeks.org/ANF-Archive/images/C8G77KPEFTDF4Q4CK8R707EUR-Gainax.jpg!
Could Evangelion have happened during the events of Gunbuster?

[spoiler]Since The earth doesn't seem to be covered in tang after 12,000 years, I'd say no. (That, And there doesn't seem to be any evidence of FTL existing in EVA.)[/spoiler]
